DOC.brief_summary: Patients with refractory epilepsy who are candidates for a treatment with vagus nerve stimulation will be prospectively randomized into 3 arms with different vagus nerve stimulation paradigms. Vagus nerve stimulation parameters are programmed and adjusted during outpatient clinic visits, within the normal clinical practice.
DOC.brief_title: Trial Comparing Different Stimulation Paradigms in Patients Treated With Vagus Nerve Stimulation for Refractory Epilepsy
DOC.criteria: 16 years or older At least 1 seizure/month with alteration of consciousness Documented seizure diary, at least 3 months prior to implantation (baseline) No change in antiepileptic drugs 1 month before implantation At least one or more AEDs Active cardiac, pulmonary or gastrointestinal disease Vagotomy Concomitant use of an investigational drug Unstable medical condition Unstable psychiatric condition
